title: Grim Dawn (v2.7.0.12) + Crucible DLC (v2.1.0.2) [GOG]

- Run "setup_grim_dawn_crucible_2.1.0.2.exe"
- Play

About: 
Enter an apocalyptic fantasy world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, iron is valued above gold and trust is hard earned. This ARPG features complex character development, hundreds of unique items, crafting and quests with choice & consequence.

About: 
The Crucible DLC introduces a challenging new arena gameplay mode to the Action RPG Grim Dawn. Enter the Crucible, a harsh battleground filled with waves of Grim Dawnâ€™s deadliest fiends. There you will engage in magnificent combat for the amusement of the Crucibleâ€™s mysterious overlord, Lokarr. But he is not a cruel master: endure his trials and be rewarded with vast wealth; fail, and know only his scorn.
